info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 12:32PM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...
Salamonie River at Portland affecting Jay County.
Wabash River near Bluffton IN affecting Wells County.
Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Wells and Adams Counties.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Eel River at North Manchester affecting Kosciusko, Wabash, Cass IN, Whitley and Miami Counties.
For the Salamonie River...including Portland...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Wabash River...including Linn Grove, Bluffton IN...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Eel River...including North Manchester...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Wabash River near Bluffton IN.
* WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water reaching the bottom of the bridge at East River Road and 450 East. River Road and a few county roads are closed by high water.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 11.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall early tomorrow afternoon. It will rise to 11.7 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
